name: Soon Light
description:
You are designated for a journey through ruins as far as the eye can see which was, one day, your civilization. 

Using your luminous robot, make your way through the darkness and restore the light.

This game is an entry for the Wowie Jam 4.0. It remains a long journey to finish developing it. I hope you'll enjoy it.

Art and programming has been made 100% during the JAM.

Good Luck !

Controls are designed to be playable with AZERTY AND QWERTY keybords.
